mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into Member(id,password,email,memberType,status) values( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberType, jdbcType=CHAR}, 'A' )
mapper.select: select * from MemberPrivate where id=#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from MemberPrivate where tel=#{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
